name: mindense
description:
Mindense is a ~2 min video game long of short stories about our different feelings during rough times.

Hope you like it.

Controls

CONTROLLER
Move: JOYSTICK/ARROWS
Jump/Action: A (xbox) or X (ps)

KEYBOARD
Move: WASD/ARROWS
Jump/Action: SPACE
Exit game: ESC

Game by

~ Thanks for playing ~
